ComicInfo.Title: Key to the Highway; She's A Hum-Dum-Dinger From Dingersville; Do-It-Yourself Maintenance Tips For National Guard Defense Vehicles!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Scout and Monday flee across the country, stopping at Scout's Uncle Begay for a change of transportation and a healing ceremony.
Lex Lucifer and his men arrive in Las Vegas.
ComicInfo.Writer: Tim Truman,Stephen Scott Beau Smith,Tim Truman,Stephen Scott Beau Smith
